summary: This document is a compilation of daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the period from July 7, 2019, to August 11, 2019. The logs detail routine operations, inmate counts, security checks, and specific entries regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein, including his movements, court appearances, and placement on suicide watch and psychological observation. The logs culminate with the entry on August 10, 2019, detailing the medical emergency and CPR performed on Epstein after he was found unresponsive in his cell.
